org.apache.flink.addons.hbase

类 TableInputFormat<T extends Tuple>

  • java.lang.Object

    public abstract class TableInputFormat<T extends Tuple>
extends AbstractTableInputFormat<T>
    InputFormat subclass that wraps the access for HTables.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getScanner

        protected abstract org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Scan getScanner()
        Returns an instance of Scan that retrieves the required subset of records from the HBase table.
        指定者:
        getScanner 在类中 AbstractTableInputFormat<T extends Tuple>
        返回:
        The appropriate instance of Scan for this usecase.

      • getTableName

        protected abstract java.lang.String getTableName()
        What table is to be read. Per instance of a TableInputFormat derivative only a single tablename is possible.
        指定者:
        getTableName 在类中 AbstractTableInputFormat<T extends Tuple>
        返回:
        The name of the table

      • mapResultToTuple

        protected abstract T mapResultToTuple(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result r)
        The output from HBase is always an instance of Result. This method is to copy the data in the Result instance into the required Tuple
        参数:
        r - The Result instance from HBase that needs to be converted
        返回:
        The approriate instance of Tuple that contains the needed information.

      • configure

        public void configure(Configuration parameters)
        Creates a Scan object and opens the HTable connection. These are opened here because they are needed in the createInputSplits which is called before the openInputFormat method. So the connection is opened in configure(Configuration) and closed in AbstractTableInputFormat.closeInputFormat().
        指定者:
        configure 在接口中 InputFormat<T extends Tuple,TableInputSplit>
        指定者:
        configure 在类中 AbstractTableInputFormat<T extends Tuple>
        参数:
        parameters - The configuration that is to be used
        另请参阅:
        Configuration

      • createTable

        private org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HTable createTable()
        Create an HTable instance and set it into this format.

      • mapResultToOutType

        protected T mapResultToOutType(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result r)
        从类复制的说明: AbstractTableInputFormat
        HBase returns an instance of Result.

        This method maps the returned Result instance into the output type T.

        指定者:
        mapResultToOutType 在类中 AbstractTableInputFormat<T extends Tuple>
        参数:
        r - The Result instance from HBase that needs to be converted
        返回:
        The appropriate instance of T that contains the data of Result.
